text: in Haiti a widespread religious belief
is that the dead continue living and
that families must forever stay
connected to their ancestors funeral
rites are among the most sacred of all
ceremonies but since the earthquake
government dump trucks have been
dropping off bodies in mass graves like
these no one counts or searches for the
names or families of the Dead your day 0
dis not but the family of Platero autist
is making sure that their deceased loved

was in you the rest of august's

funeral home but it ran out of embalming
fluid and has no electricity to
refrigerate the bodies the family picks
up August's body and loads it into the

hill anyway joined by a growing
procession of mourners
